name: SignsofsubstantialriskofHIVinfectionCodes
title: Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection element

concept.display: No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months
Sexually transmitted infection (STI) in the past 6 months
A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors
No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months
A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors
